thread.title: Aamir Khan bats for gender equality
thread.title_full: Aamir Khan bats for gender equality

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE.
title: Aamir Khan bats for gender equality
text:
Aamir Khan in a still from the ad, which drives across a powerful message on women empowerment. Aamir Khan is in the news yet again and for all the right reasons. Netizens are all praise for the actor’s latest commercial for a TV channel, which drives across a powerful message on women empowerment, and has been trending since.
In the ad, Aamir, who named his sweet shop, Gurdeep Singh and daughters, is seen telling a customer that his business has been doing great after it was listed on the internet, to which the customer says that he has been blessed with worthy sons. Aamir corrects him by saying “not sons, but daughters”.
The commercial sends out the right message: “Success doesn’t come to a boy or a girl. Success comes to one with the right thinking.”
